casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gabriel A. FERRARI 277P18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Gabriel Adrian Ferrari, for Gabriel A. Ferrari. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of October 2018 by Defendant to Strike Notice/Letter:

*177"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
